metadata.title: CVE-2021-22224 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in the GraphQL API in GitLabsince version 13.12 and before versions 13.12.6 and 14.0.2 allowed anattacker to call mutations as the victim

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
